sentences.sentence: Contemporary cosmologist Karen L.Masters also finds the topic of cube worlds fascinating — especially the atmospheric possibilities.
sentences.translation: 当代的宇宙学家卡伦·l·马斯特斯也发现立方体世界的话题很是迷人，特别是如果有大气存在的情况下更是如此。

sentences.sentence: Contemporary cosmologist Karen L. Masters also finds the topic of cube worlds fascinating — especially the atmospheric possibilities.
sentences.translation: 当代的宇宙学家卡伦·l·马斯特斯也发现立方体世界的话题很是迷人，特别是如果有大气存在的情况下更是如此。

sentences.sentence: One of the longest-living survivors of the condition is Stephen Hawking, the 68-year-old cosmologist, who was diagnosed at the age of 21.
sentences.translation: 活的最久的患者之一是史蒂芬·霍金，这位68岁高龄的天体物理学家，在他21岁时被确诊患有此病。
